parameters.name: AssetType
parameters.description:
The type of the asset. Valid values:

*   **0**: an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.
*   **3**: an ApsaraDB RDS instance.
*   **4**: an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.
*   **5**: an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

parameters.name: CspmStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the asset has Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) risks. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: ExposureComponent
parameters.description: The server component that is exposed on the Internet.

parameters.name: ExposureIp
parameters.description: The public IP address of the server or the public endpoint of the database.

parameters.name: ExposurePort
parameters.description: The port that is exposed on the Internet.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the server group.

> You can call the [DescribeAllGroups](~~DescribeAllGroups~~) operation to query the IDs of server groups.

parameters.name: HealthStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the asset has weak password risks. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: VulStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the asset has vulnerabilities. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**
